# Copilot / AI Agent Instructions

This is a small React + Vite demo app. The goal of this file is to give focused, actionable context so an AI coding agent can be productive immediately.

- **Project type:** React (v19) + Vite. App entry: [src/main.jsx](src/main.jsx#L1-L12).
- **Dev commands:** use `npm run dev` (Vite), `npm run build`, `npm run preview`, `npm run lint` — see `package.json` scripts.

**Big picture / structure**
- **Root entry:** [index.html](index.html#L1-L20) loads [src/main.jsx](src/main.jsx#L1-L12).
- **Top-level UI:** `App` at [src/App.jsx](src/App.jsx#L1-L40) conditionally renders the login or the home page.
- **Auth system:** `AuthProvider` at [src/auth/AuthContext.jsx](src/auth/AuthContext.jsx#L1-L40) wraps the app; `useAuth` hook is in [src/auth/useAuth.js](src/auth/useAuth.js#L1-L40).
- **UI components:** components under `src/component/` — e.g. login form at [src/component/auth/LoginForm.jsx](src/component/auth/LoginForm.jsx#L1-L200) and a home page at [src/component/abc/home.jsx](src/component/abc/home.jsx).

**Project-specific conventions & patterns**
- Uses React Context for auth (`AuthProvider` + `useAuth` named hook).
- UI uses `react-bootstrap` components (see `LoginForm.jsx` imports) and `bootstrap` CSS is a project dependency.
- Styling is in `src/index.css` and `src/App.css`.

**Important gotchas / actionable notes discovered**
- Naming mismatch: `AuthContext` exposes `isLogin` (boolean) but `App` reads `isAuthenticated`. This is a real bug to watch for — fixes should either change `AuthContext` to expose `isAuthenticated` or update `App` to use `isLogin`. Files: [src/auth/AuthContext.jsx](src/auth/AuthContext.jsx#L1-L30), [src/App.jsx](src/App.jsx#L1-L20).
- `LoginForm.jsx` uses a form `onSubmit={handleLogin}` but `handleLogin` does not call `event.preventDefault()`. Submissions may reload the page. See [src/component/auth/LoginForm.jsx](src/component/auth/LoginForm.jsx#L1-L200).
- Credentials are hardcoded (`admin`/`admin`) in `LoginForm.jsx`; authentication is local-only (no backend integration).

**Workflows / commands for developers**
- Start dev server: `npm run dev` (Vite with HMR). Open browser at the URL printed by Vite.
- Build: `npm run build` then `npm run preview` to locally test the production build.
- Lint: `npm run lint` uses ESLint (configs under repo root). There are no test scripts configured.

**Where to look for common tasks**
- Add a new page/component: put under `src/component/<area>/` and import from `App.jsx` or a router when added.
- Add global providers (e.g., new contexts): wrap in `src/main.jsx` near `AuthProvider`.
- If changing auth flow, update both the context shape and all callers (notably `App.jsx` and `LoginForm.jsx`).

**Examples (quick edits an agent might do)**
- Fix auth mismatch: change `AuthContext` value key `isLogin` → `isAuthenticated` (or adapt `App.jsx`). Search: `isLogin` / `isAuthenticated`.
- Prevent form reload: modify `handleLogin` in `LoginForm.jsx` to accept `event` and call `event.preventDefault()`.

If anything in this file looks off or you'd like additional detail (CI, tests, or coding style rules), tell me which area to expand. After your review I can iterate on this file.
